entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
